name: Ollie
description: a Ollie is a trick where you pop the board up, jump, drag your foot up the board, and land back on the board

name: Pop Shuvit
description: a Pop Shuvit is a trick where you pop the board to make it spin 180 degrees, and land back on the board
a 180 is the same as an Ollie but your body and board spins 180 degrees

name: 360 Pop Shuvit
description: a 360 Pop Shuvit is the same as a Pop Shuvit but with a extra 180 degree spin

name: Heelflip
description: a Heelflip is a trick where you pop the board up, drag your foot up the board, and flick your foot off the front of the board

name: Kickflip
description: a Kickflip is a trick where you pop the board up, drag your foot up the board, and flick your foot off the side of the board

name: Varial Kickflip
description: a Varial Kickflip is the combination of a Backside Pop Shuvit and a Kickflip

name: Varial Heelflip
description: a Varial Heelflip is the combination of a Frontside Pop Shuvit and a Heelflip

name: Big Spin
description: a Big Spin is the combination of 360 Pop Shuvit and a Body Varial (jumping 180 degrees) in the same direction

name: Big Flip
description: A Big Flip is the combination of a Big Spin and a Kickflip

name: 360 Flip/Tre Flip
description: a 360 Flip is the combination of a Backside 360 Pop Shuvit and a Kickflip

name: Laser Flip
description: a Laser Flip is the combination of a Frontside 360 Pop Shuvit and a Heelflip

name: Hardflip
description: a Hardflip is the combination of a Frontside Pop Shuvit and a Kickflip

name: Inward Heelflip
description: a Inward Heelflip is the combination of a Backside Pop Shuvit and a Heelflip
